led.doc: HID LED interface for Hammerspoon, controls the state of keyboard LEDs

get.desc: Checks the state of the caps lock via HID
get.doc:
Checks the state of the caps lock via HID

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * true if on, false if off
get.name: get
returns: * true if on, false if off

set.desc: Assigns capslock to the desired state
set.doc:
Assigns capslock to the desired state

Parameters:
 * state - A boolean indicating desired state

Returns:
 * true if on, false if off
set.name: set
parameters: * state - A boolean indicating desired state
returns: * true if on, false if off

toggle.desc: Toggles the state of caps lock via HID
toggle.doc:
Toggles the state of caps lock via HID

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * true if on, false if off
toggle.name: toggle
returns: * true if on, false if off
